background.text: ORDER BELOW EXH.1 IN BAIL APPLN. No.63/2019 (Passed on 11­01­2019) 1] The applicant­accused Pangya Alias Vikas Dhondiram Jadhav has filed this bail petition under sec. 439 of Cr.P.C. in CR No. 779/18 registered with Nigdi police station, U/sec. 392, 395 rw 34 of Indian Penal Code, 1860.

legalActFound.stringMatched: u/sec. 392, 395 rw 34 of indian penal code

arguments.text: 2] The Investigating officer and Ld. APP have filed their say and resisted the application.

argumentSentences.text: 2] The Investigating officer and Ld. APP have filed their say and resisted the application.

arguments.text: 3] Heard Ld. Counsel on behalf of applicant­accused and Ld.APP.

argumentSentences.text: 3] Heard Ld. Counsel on behalf of applicant­accused and Ld.APP.

arguments.text: 4] Prima facie from record it reveals that, on 02.10.2018 at 11.00 am in front of pan stall near HDFC ATM center, Kudalwadi, Chikhli, Pune informant Rahul Omparaksh Gautam and his friend Tilakram Pol while proceeding to their house, four persons/accused came on two bikes. Three bikers alliated and started beating to informant and Tilakram, but Tilkaram run away from their clutches. One accused out of them assaulted informant from the backside of the sickle and forcibly taken Rs. 100 from the pocket of the informant. Then they thrown the empty pocket on the person of informant and run away. Hence on report of informant aforesaid crime was registered.

argumentSentences.text: 4] Prima facie from record it reveals that, on 02.10.2018 at 11.00 am in front of pan stall near HDFC ATM center, Kudalwadi, Chikhli, Pune informant Rahul Omparaksh Gautam and his friend Tilakram Pol while proceeding to their house, four persons/accused came on two bikes.
Three bikers alliated and started beating to informant and Tilakram, but Tilkaram run away from their clutches.
One accused out of them assaulted informant from the backside of the sickle and forcibly taken Rs. 100 from the pocket of the informant.
Then they thrown the empty pocket on the person of informant and run away.
Hence on report of informant aforesaid crime was registered.

arguments.text: 5] Prima­facie it was a robbery of Rs. 100/­ which amount is already recovered by the police from accused. The present applicant was arrested on 20.10.2018 and no purpose is going to be served by keeping him by behind the bar. Therefore, I am of the opinion that applicant is entitle for bail. Hence the order.

argumentSentences.text: 5] Prima­facie it was a robbery of Rs. 100/­ which amount is already recovered by the police from accused.
The present applicant was arrested on 20.10.2018 and no purpose is going to be served by keeping him by behind the bar.
Therefore, I am of the opinion that applicant is entitle for bail.

order.text: ORDER 1] The application is allowed. 2 O in BA No.63/19 CNR­MHPU01000232­2019 2] The applicant Pangya Alias Vikas Dhondiram Jadhav is released on bail in CR No. 779/18 registered with Nigdi police station,U/sec. 392, 395 rw 34 of Indian Penal Code, 1860 on his executing of PB and SB of Rs.15,000/­. 3] The applicant shall not tamper to the prosecution witnesses. 4] Bail before concerned JMFC.

processedText:
O in BA No.63/19 CNR­MHPU01000232­2019 
---header-ends---
ORDER BELOW EXH.1 IN BAIL APPLN. No.63/2019 (Passed on 11­01­2019) 1] The applicant­accused Pangya Alias Vikas Dhondiram Jadhav has filed this bail petition under sec. 439 of Cr.P.C. in CR No. 779/18 registered with Nigdi police station, U/sec. 392, 395 rw 34 of Indian Penal Code, 1860. 
---background-ends---
2] The Investigating officer and Ld. APP have filed their say and resisted the application. 
---argument-ends---
3] Heard Ld. Counsel on behalf of applicant­accused and Ld.APP. 
---argument-ends---
4] Prima facie from record it reveals that, on 02.10.2018 at 11.00 am in front of pan stall near HDFC ATM center, Kudalwadi, Chikhli, Pune informant Rahul Omparaksh Gautam and his friend Tilakram Pol while proceeding to their house, four persons/accused came on two bikes. Three bikers alliated and started beating to informant and Tilakram, but Tilkaram run away from their clutches. One accused out of them assaulted informant from the backside of the sickle and forcibly taken Rs. 100 from the pocket of the informant. Then they thrown the empty pocket on the person of informant and run away. Hence on report of informant aforesaid crime was registered. 
---argument-ends---
5] Prima­facie it was a robbery of Rs. 100/­ which amount is already recovered by the police from accused. The present applicant was arrested on 20.10.2018 and no purpose is going to be served by keeping him by behind the bar. Therefore, I am of the opinion that applicant is entitle for bail. Hence the order. 
---argument-ends---
ORDER 1] The application is allowed. 2 O in BA No.63/19 CNR­MHPU01000232­2019 2] The applicant Pangya Alias Vikas Dhondiram Jadhav is released on bail in CR No. 779/18 registered with Nigdi police station,U/sec. 392, 395 rw 34 of Indian Penal Code, 1860 on his executing of PB and SB of Rs.15,000/­. 3] The applicant shall not tamper to the prosecution witnesses. 4] Bail before concerned JMFC. 
---order-ends---
( S.K.Karhale ) Dt. 11.01.2019.
